pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Random Forest with Compositional Responses // Multivariate random forests with compositional responses and Euclidean predictors is performed. The compositional data are first transformed using the additive log-ratio transformation, or the alpha-transformation of Tsagris, Preston and Wood (2011), doi:10.48550/arXiv.1106.1451, and then the multivariate random forest of Rahman R., Otridge J. and Pal R. (2017), doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btw765, is applied.
